name: Kjeldoran Royal Guard

generous in death."

Honorable in battle, generous in death.

Honorable in battle, generous in death.

Upon the frozen tundra stand the Kjeldoran Royal Guard, pikes raised, with the king's oath upon their lips.

name: Kjeldoran Skycaptain
text: Flying; first strike; banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

editions.flavor:
"If we do our duty and uphold our honor, Kjeldor shall stand for a thousand years."
—Arna Kennerüd, Skyknight

"If we do our duty and uphold our honor, Kjeldor shall stand for a thousand years."
—Arna Kennerüd, skyknight
The heartlink between soldier and steed is hatched with the aesthir struggling from its shell.

name: Kjeldoran Skyknight
text: Flying; first strike; banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

editions.flavor:
"My Aesthir is my most trusted ally. We fight as one and live as one, and we will die as one."
—Arna Kennerüd, Skyknight

name: Kjeldoran War Cry
text: Creatures you control get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is 1 plus the number of cards named Kjeldoran War Cry in all graveyards.

editions.flavor: King Darien's breath crystallized and fell to the frozen battlefield, but its command carried true to all soldiers of New Argive.

name: Kjeldoran Warrior
text: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

editions.flavor:
"Give me a thousand such Warriors and I could change the world."

name: Knacksaw Clique
text:
Flying
{1}{U}, {Q}: Target opponent exiles the top card of his or her library. Until end of turn, you may play that card. ({Q} is the untap symbol.)

editions.flavor: Most of the Knacksaw clique's skills were hewn from the minds of others.

text:
When Knight-Captain of Eos enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

"If you think you are brave enough to walk the path of honor, follow me into the dragon's den."

−5: You get an emblem with "Mountains you control have ‘{T}: This land deals 1 damage to target creature or player.'"

name: Kothophed, Soul Hoarder
text:
Flying
Whenever a permanent owned by another player is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

editions.flavor: "I will be your most demanding master, Liliana. But I have great things in mind for you."

name: Koth's Courier
text: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

editions.flavor: Koth sent partisans into the Tangle to bring survivors to the safe haven of the tunnels below Kuldotha.

name: Kozilek, Butcher of Truth
text:
When you cast Kozilek, Butcher of Truth, draw four cards.
Annihilator 4 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices four permanents.)
When Kozilek is put into a graveyard from anywhere, its owner shuffles his or her graveyard into his or her library.

name: Kozilek's Channeler
text: {T}: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool.

editions.flavor: "In the dark places of our world, something horrible is growing. I fear our foes may be more numerous than we had imagined."—Nissa Revane

name: Kozilek's Pathfinder
text: {C}: Target creature can't block Kozilek's Pathfinder this turn. ({C} represents colorless mana.)

editions.flavor:
"We didn't know where it came from or where it was going. All we knew was that we did not matter."
—Akiri, kor line-slinger

name: Kozilek's Predator
text: When Kozilek's Predator enters the battlefield, create two 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C} to your mana pool."

editions.flavor: It's difficult to outwit something that doesn't speak, strategize, or even think.

name: Kozilek's Return
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Kozilek's Return deals 2 damage to each creature.
Whenever you cast an Eldrazi creature spell with converted mana cost 7 or greater, you may exile Kozilek's Return from your graveyard. If you do, Kozilek's Return deals 5 damage to each creature.

name: Kozilek's Sentinel
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Whenever you cast a colorless spell, Kozilek's Sentinel gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: It moves through the tunnels as slowly and surely as the shifting stones.

name: Kozilek's Shrieker
